resources.string: To enable us to give you the best user experience ever please give access to location services.We promise to put it to good use
Oops !! Your looks like we lost the connection there . Check your internet connection and try again
Oops !! Connection failed,Please connect to the internet and try again
That wasn\'t supposed to happen. Please restart the application and try again
Please turn on your location to continue
Please turn on Location Services to continue
Oops. You seem to be out of service.
